boardgame.name: Cthulhu Wars
クトゥルフ・ウォーズ
크툴루 워즈
boardgame.description: Cthulhu Wars is a strategy boardgame in which the players take the part of alien races and gods taken from the Cthulhu mythos created by H. P. Lovecraft. The game is physically large, and includes sixty-four figurines of the cultists, monsters, aliens, and Great Old Ones that range in height from approximately 20 mm to nearly 180 mm._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game takes place on a map of Earth. Each player takes the part of one of four factions included in the base game. At the start of a turn, players Gather Power, then, during a series of Action Rounds, they spend this Power to accomplish various tasks, such as recruiting Cultists, moving units, engaging in battle, summoning monsters, building Gates, casting spells, and Awakening their Great Old One. When all players run out of Power, the Action phase ends and the next turn begins. Victory is determined by accumulating points on the Doom Track. The first player to 30 is the lone victor *if* he has unlocked all six of spell books._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Driving the strategy are a player's wish to expand his power base, and his need to accomplish six tasks to acquire his faction's spell books. Each faction has a unique set of monsters, spell books, and special abilities, and has different requirements to acquire its spell books. All factions have multiple strategies open to them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The base game supports 2-4 players (the map supports 5 players), but with new factions and maps released as expansions it can support up to 8 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes:
This is for 1) Everything in Cultist level Kickstarter pledge along with KS exclusives _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; bonuses. 2) Includes all the Great Old Ones (GOOs) that are part of KS bonuses. 3) Includes Opener of the Way Faction Expansion along with its corresponding KS Bonuses 4) Includes Azathoth Faction Expansion along with its corresponding KS Bonuses 5) Includes Windwalker Faction Expansion along with its corresponding KS Bonuses 6) Includes Sleeper Faction Expansion along with its corresponding KS Bonuses
Please see http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1816687860/cthulhu-wars for more details about the game. Shipping: Should be able to change the shipping address in the KS pledge making it free. Otherwise, Buyer is responsible for actual shipping costs. Buyer is also responsible for any commissions. Note: Game is not released yet and it is a pre-order. Please see the Kickstarter for more details on estimated shipping date.

Item on pre-order, bought on Kickstarter. It contains the base game + Faction bundle + High Priest expansion + Gates expansion + KS Exclusives (Cultist Level). Price includes shipping. Atention: As stated above, this item was payed via Fundafull. The buyer will receive my login and password, so access to Fundafull will be enabled. The buyer will be completely responsible for changing Login, Password and Shipping address. Regarding payment: I wish gift certificates as payment for the game. Coolstuff and Miniature Market only. Thanks for watching.
Reserved for Mark Pierce (mantra6)
Complete De Vermiis Mysteriis pledge

This is for a De Vermiis Mysteriis (DVM) pledge of Cthulhu Wars including a couple of extras: - Canadian shipping ($20 during the Kickstarter campaign)* - 11x17 signed art print. *The above shipping option means that shipping is FREE if you are in the US or Canada. The DVM package includes almost too much to mention (I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m sure I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll leave something out)! The DVM package includes all gameplay items: - Full base game, - Asenath Waite player marker - H.P. Lovecraft player marker - 20 Custom dice - 22 Upgraded miniature gates - The Opener of the Way expansion (Yog Sothoth) - Azathoth _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;neutral_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; faction expansion - Windwalker faction expansion (Ithaqua) - Sleeper faction expansion (Tsathoggua) - The High Priest expansion - Dreamlands Underworld Expansion Pack - Dreamlands Surface Expansion Pack - Primeval Map Expansion - Yuggoth Map Expansion - 6-8 player map - 10 extra Great Old Ones (including Gobodeg, Sandy Petersen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Original GOO) - 34 Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition figures Very important note: the game is still in the manufacturing step. I do not have it in my possession. No one has this game yet. Send me your email address and once payment is verified, I will update the Fundafull site with your email so that you can take over the pledge. You can put in your address and request for the account to be unlocked if you want to make changes to the pledge details.

With a sad heart I have to get rid of my Cultist Pledge including: - EU Shipping $45 - 20 Custom Dice - High Priest Expansion - Plastic Miniature Gates - The Sleeper Expansion - The Windwalker Expansion - Cultist Stretch Goals: Abhoth, Atlach-Nacha, Bokrug, Chaugnar Faugn, Cthugha, Ghatanothoa, Yig, Father Dagon and Mother Hydra + more. When payment is received, I’ll transfer the pledge at Fundafull.

HOT off the presses! This long anticipated game is finally available! The artwork of the figs alone is worth the price of admission! Add in a great game, and you have yourself a classic. This one will be worth a bundle down the road. I am keeping a few copies for myself!

You are buying my Kickstarter copy of Cthulhu Wars, along with all add-ons I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve splurged on. The add-ons are due to arrive this summer. I will ensure they get sent directly to you! You will get 2 shipments with this listing. The base game will ship ASAP, the add-ons will ship once the Kickstarter is fulfilled (currently expected this summer). Everything included in this listing: Cthulhu Wars base game, kickstarted copy with all the beautiful miniatures! The shrink wrap has been opened, inventoried, and verified complete. Cardboard components have been punched and sorted appropriately. This will be sent ASAP. Add-ons to be delivered: High Priest Expansion Pack 22 Plastic Miniature Gates Yuggoth Map Expansion Opener of the Way Faction Expansion The Sleeper Faction Expansion Windwalker Faction Expansion Azathoth Faction Expansion Cthulhu Wars T-Shirt size XL All Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Miniatures The base game is beyond massive. Shipping for both will be $30 anywhere in the USA, or local pick up for free in Reston VA.

Petersen Games (PETCTHU01) Cthulhu Wars is a strategy board game in which the players take the part of alien races and gods taken from the Cthulhu mythos created by H. P. Lovecraft. The game is physically large, and includes sixty-four figurines of the cultists, monsters, aliens, and Great Old Ones that range in height from approximately 20 mm to nearly 180 mm. The game takes place on a map of Earth. Each player takes the part of one of four factions included in the base game. At the start of a turn, players Gather Power, then, during a series of Action Rounds, they spend this Power to accomplish various tasks, such as recruiting Cultists, moving units, engaging in battle, summoning monsters, building Gates, casting spells, and Awakening their Great Old One. When all players run out of Power, the Action phase ends and the next turn begins. Victory is determined by accumulating points on the Doom Track. The first player to 30 is the lone victor *if* he has unlocked all six of spell books. Driving the strategy are a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wish to expand his power base, and his need to accomplish six tasks to acquire his faction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s spell books. Each faction has a unique set of monsters, spell books, and special abilities, and has different requirements to acquire its spell books. All factions have multiple strategies open to them.
in shrink

Petersen Games (PETCTHU01) Cthulhu Wars is a strategy board game in which the players take the part of alien races and gods taken from the Cthulhu mythos created by H. P. Lovecraft. The game is physically large, and includes sixty-four figurines of the cultists, monsters, aliens, and Great Old Ones that range in height from approximately 20 mm to nearly 180 mm. The game takes place on a map of Earth. Each player takes the part of one of four factions included in the base game. At the start of a turn, players Gather Power, then, during a series of Action Rounds, they spend this Power to accomplish various tasks, such as recruiting Cultists, moving units, engaging in battle, summoning monsters, building Gates, casting spells, and Awakening their Great Old One. When all players run out of Power, the Action phase ends and the next turn begins. Victory is determined by accumulating points on the Doom Track. The first player to 30 is the lone victor *if* he has unlocked all six of spell books. Driving the strategy are a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wish to expand his power base, and his need to accomplish six tasks to acquire his faction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s spell books. Each faction has a unique set of monsters, spell books, and special abilities, and has different requirements to acquire its spell books. All factions have multiple strategies open to them.

Kickstarter First Edition - See back cover panel pic Amazon Pricing 2 new from $299.95 Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Item - Game keeps going up in value. Cthulhu Wars is a combination of strategic gaming and Lovecraftian horror, with the bonus of high-quality monster figures to make your game even more fun. Game was opened to insure miniatures were not broken (which was a problem for some shipments of 1st Edition) Game is pristine - Unpunched - Unplayed Product Information Product Dimensions 17 x 6.5 x 13 inches Shipping Weight 13.7 pounds Product Description The Old Ones have risen. Monsters walk the Earth. Humanity is finished but the struggle continues. Which Great Old One will rule the ruins of Earth? Now, you take charge! Cthulhu Wars is a fast-moving strategy game about the end of the world. You take part of various monstrous aliens seeking to dominate the world. You can play as Great Cthulhu himself, or you can take charge of the other factions, such as the slither hordes of the Crawling Chaos, or the insane minions of the Yellow Sign.

Strongly prefer to sell in person near Gaithersburg, MD area or near Tysons Corner, VA. The game has only been played 2 times. Also, I laminated the player boards and tracks which improves their durability.
